tasks.task: Conducting agricultural research on water-stress resistant wheat at CIMMET's research station.
subtasks: Managing irrigation systems to simulate various water conditions.
Planting and maintaining wheat trials under zero tillage and conventional tilled conditions.
Observing wheat growth under stress conditions.
Harvesting and analyzing grain yield using combine harvesters.

tasks.task: Breeding and testing drought-resistant wheat varieties.
subtasks: Evaluating wheat genotypes for their performance under water-stress conditions.
Comparing zero-tillage versus conventionally tilled wheat yield under precision water management.
Analyzing the grain fill and quality of harvested wheat samples.
